me swamin wahanse pera pasebudu kenekuta ”me mudu sha්ramanaya anga kunu wi athi bawin anga wasa porawa yanne ya yi” kiya dosharopanaya kirima hethuwen boho kal nirayehi pasi kashyapa buddha kalaye di piriwajiyek wi sitiya di silwath upasaka mahathekuta ”numbaa kushta rogiyeku wanne hi ya” kiya aakrosha kale ya.

enanam pudgala paurshathwaya meyin pilambaimbau karayi.kuli wadi duratath dakwanne pudgalaya hudakalawa gatha hakiwuwath ohuge aathmaya nohoth paurshathwaya samajaya samaga badi pawathina bawayi.pudgala charyawa hadagasima sadaha anthar kriyawan balapana bawayi.eya samaja anthar kriyawa yanuwen hadunwayi.samaja anthar kriyawaka mulika lakshana pahatha paridi we. 01.pudgalayan dedeneku ho eeta wadiyen sitiya yuthuya. 02.owun athara anthar kriyawan ha prathikriyawan ituwiya yuthuya. 03.pudgalaya ha samajaya ema prathikriyawan ha kriyawan pilibadawa awabodhayen sitiya yuthuya.
